description: Finalize repo hygiene and CI stability on the current branch. All work stays in one PR with local verification, CI green, and clear rollback.

userStories.title: Re-verify local quality gates (single source of truth)
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I need local checks to reflect CI expectations before pushing a PR.
acceptanceCriteria: Record any non-fatal warnings in PR notes
userStories.notes: Keep results in a single PR checklist; do not split into multiple PRs.

userStories.title: Assess and document non-fatal test warnings
userStories.description: As a reviewer, I need clarity on console warnings/errors that do not fail tests.
acceptanceCriteria: List known warnings (e.g., websocket connection refused, open handle warnings)
State impact and whether they are expected in test context
Add follow-up items if any warning risks real regressions
userStories.notes: Do not change behavior unless needed; document first.

userStories.title: Review workflow changes for applicability
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I need to remove any repo-hygiene changes that are not applicable.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove or adjust any items not fitting repo needs
Ensure lint and typecheck still pass

userStories.title: Prepare a single PR (no branch switching)
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I need exactly one PR for all changes in this effort.
acceptanceCriteria: PR description includes: change list, risks, rollback, tests run
All changes stay on current branch

userStories.title: Push and verify PR checks
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I need CI to be green before merge.
acceptanceCriteria: Open a single PR to main
